definition: (coll.) (neologism c. 2017, a play on 伏地魔[Fu2 di4 mo2]) woman who devotes herself to supporting her little brother (assisting him with his studies, giving money to help him buy a house etc)
to support with the hand/to help sb up/to support oneself by holding onto something/to help
variant of 悌[ti4]
younger brother/junior male/I (modest word in letter)
devil/magic
(Internet slang) guy who grew up in the countryside and gained a foothold in the city through hard work
mama's boy
unquestioning filial piety
(Internet slang) spoiled city girl from a rich family
(slang) male chauvinism
to value males and attach less importance to females (idiom)
(coll.) adults still living with and depending on their parents
(coll.) to live with and depend on one's parents even upon reaching adulthood
(neologism c. 2017) adult who behaves in a childish manner (e.g. throwing a tantrum)
materialistic woman/(slang) gold-digger
(coll.) jerk/scumbag
those who did not benefit from the Chinese economic reforms of the 1980s/see also 富二代[fu4 er4 dai4]
to marry and live with the bride's family (inverting traditional Chinese expectations)
(coll.) stepmother
husband's family
henpecked male
